mdRecord.dcterms:title: Microscope
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bausch & Lomb Optical Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Binocular microscope (serial number 266487) with heavy cast tilt base, bi-directional field frame for slides, macro and micro vernier focus, swivel optical head with removable pieces, interchangeable 5x and 10x eye pieces, lower field pieces, and adjustable flat and concave mirror for light source.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
Donated by Kal and Julie Howard [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus--Microscopes
